Definition.WordDefinition: Bakersfield, CA (city, FIPS 3526) Location: 35.35770 N, 119.00455 W Population (1990): 174820 (66175 housing units) Area: 237.9 sq km (land), 3.4 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 93301, 93304, 93306, 93307, 93308, 93309, 93311, 93313 Bakersfield, MO (village, FIPS 3052) Location: 36.52408 N, 92.14423 W Population (1990): 292 (128 housing units) Area: 3.7 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 65609 Bakersfield, VT Zip code(s): 05441
